articles.headline: Blackhawks settle second lawsuit in Aldrich sexual assault case
articles.description: The Blackhawks settled a second lawsuit claiming the team was negligent in dealing with sexual assault allegations against then-video coach Brad Aldrich in 2010.

images.name: Blackhawks logo [600x400] - Copy

articles.headline: NHL 26 review roundup: Be A Pro mode the lone bright spot
articles.description: Critics recognize EA Sports' attempts at improving NHL 26, but have collectively deemed the efforts as insufficient.

images.name: NHL 26 [1296x729]
images.caption: NHL 26 has some improvements, but the series still has a ways to go.

articles.headline: Sabres' Rasmus Dahlin details fiancée's 'unimaginable' health scare
articles.description: Sabres captain Rasmus Dahlin said he's in "awe" of his fiancée, Carolina Matovac, who received a heart transplant this summer following a traumatic health scare while on vacation.

articles.headline: Evgeni Malkin hoping this isn't final season with Penguins
articles.description: Evgeni Malkin isn't sure if this 20th NHL season will be his last -- either with the Penguins or the league at large. All the veteran can say is he's not prepared to hang up his skates.

articles.headline: Matt Petgrave, whose skate fatally cut Adam Johnson, joins ECHL
articles.description: Matt Petgrave, the player whose skate fatally cut Adam Johnson's neck in a hockey game in Britain nearly two years ago, has signed a contract to play for the Indy Fuel of the minor league ECHL.
